/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant mix of green and yellow, suggesting that the season is autumn. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. On the right side of the street, red buses are parked, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
